sentences.en: Even the most gifted can have confidence destroyed by the wrong instructor.
sentences.cn: 即使是最有天赋的人也可能会被错误的导师摧毁自信。

sentences.en: He worked as a dance instructor in London before setting himself up in Bucharest.
sentences.cn: 在布加勒斯特开公司之前，他在伦敦当舞蹈教练。

sentences.en: He's the world's greatest diving instructor - if you can stomach him.
sentences.cn: 如果你能受得了的话,他是世界上最伟大的跳水教练.

sentences.en: Her instructor plugged live bullets into the gun's chamber.
sentences.cn: 她的教练在枪膛里装上了实弹。

sentences.en: His sailing instructor fell overboard and drowned during a lesson.
sentences.cn: 他的航海教练在一次训练课时从船上失足跌入水中，溺水身亡。

sentences.en: I'll teach him to ski myself, rather than leave him to the tender mercy of the skiing instructor.
sentences.cn: 我会亲自教他滑雪, 而不让他吃滑雪教练的苦头.

sentences.en: Joyce is talking to Terry, an instructor at the dive center.
sentences.cn: 乔依丝正与潜水中心的教练泰瑞说话.

sentences.en: Mary took the place of Helen as an instructor.
My instructor and I had a brief disagreement.
sentences.cn: 我和我的导师有过一次小摩擦。

sentences.en: My instructor thought that the beginner's class was too easy for me.
sentences.cn: 老师认为初级课程对我来说太容易了.

sentences.en: The college jumped him from instructor to full professor.
sentences.cn: 大学突然把他从讲师提升为正教授.
那位导师从不蜚短流长说人坏话.

sentences.en: The instructor took it for granted that no preliminaries were needed.
sentences.cn: 教练员当然地认为不需要任何开场白.

sentences.en: The sage is the instructor of a hundred ages.
The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练搞糊涂.

words.tran_cn: 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

trans.tran_en: someone who teaches a sport or practical skill
